short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reload current page by closing it and opening a new tab

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chrome Canary is a bit glitchy now. To get rid of that issues you always have to close and open your tabs.
This widget is for that case.

The source code for this extension is stored here: https://github.com/termosa/renew-chrome-extension
